availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Massachusetts native. Married to Annie Morrill Hobbs. Father of Alice A. Hobbs and Edith M. Hobbs. School teacher in Waltham, Massachusetts in 1855. Justice of the Peace of Boston, Massachusetts in 1864.

ab.bibl: Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Massachusetts, Suffolk County, Boston, District 759, p. 23; Massachusetts State Census (1855), Massachusetts, Middlesex County, Waltham, p. 48; Find A Grave, "George Miller Hobbs (1827-1912)," Memorial #146284471, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=146284471&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0303.
